00020 #include <string.h>
00021 #include <ccn/btree.h>
00022 #include <ccn/btree_content.h>
00023 #include <ccn/bloom.h>
00024 #include <ccn/ccn.h>
00025 #include <ccn/flatname.h>
00026 
00027 #ifndef MYFETCH
00028 #define MYFETCH(p, f) ccn_btree_fetchval(&((p)->f[0]), sizeof((p)->f))
00029 #endif
00030 
00031 #ifndef MYSTORE
00032 #define MYSTORE(p, f, v) ccn_btree_storeval(&((p)->f[0]), sizeof((p)->f), (v))
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 #ifndef MYFETCH64
00036 #define MYFETCH64(p, f) ccn_btree_fetchval64(&((p)->f[0]), sizeof((p)->f))
00037 #endif
00038 static uint_least64_t
00039 ccn_btree_fetchval64(const unsigned char *p, int size)
00040 {
00041     int i;
00042     uint_least64_t v;
00043     
00044     for (v = 0, i = 0; i < size; i++)
00045         v = (v << 8) + p[i];
00046     return(v);
00047 }
00048 
00049 #ifndef MYSTORE64
00050 #define MYSTORE64(p, f, v) ccn_btree_storeval64(&((p)->f[0]), sizeof((p)->f), (v))
00051 #endif
00052 static void
00053 ccn_btree_storeval64(unsigned char *p, int size, uint_least64_t v)
00054 {
00055     int i;
00056     
00057     for (i = size; i > 0; i--, v >>= 8)
00058         p[i-1] = v;
00059 }
00060 
00061 /**
00062  * Insert a ContentObject into a btree node
00063  *
00064  * The caller has presumably already done a lookup and found that the
00065  * object is not there.
00066  *
00067  * The caller is responsible for provinding a valid content parse (pc).
00068  *
00069  * The flatname buffer should hold the correct full name, including the
00070  * digest.
00071  *
00072  * @returns the new entry count or, -1 for error.
00073  */
00074 int
00075 ccn_btree_insert_content(struct ccn_btree_node *node, int ndx,
00076                          uint_least64_t cobid,
00077                          const unsigned char *content_object,
00078                          struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject *pc,
00079                          struct ccn_charbuf *flatname)
00080 {
00081     struct ccn_btree_content_payload payload;
00082     struct ccn_btree_content_payload *e = &payload;
00083     int ncomp;
00084     int res;
00085     unsigned size;
00086     unsigned flags = 0;
00087     const unsigned char *blob = NULL;
00088     size_t blob_size = 0;
00089     
00090     size = pc->offset[CCN_PCO_E];
00091     ncomp = ccn_flatname_ncomps(flatname->buf, flatname->length);
00092     if (ncomp != pc->name_ncomps + 1)
00093         return(-1);
00094     memset(e, 'U', sizeof(*e));
00095     MYSTORE(e, magic, CCN_BT_CONTENT_MAGIC);
00096     MYSTORE(e, ctype, pc->type);
00097     MYSTORE(e, cobsz, size);
00098     MYSTORE(e, ncomp, ncomp);
00099     MYSTORE(e, flags, flags); // XXX - need to set CCN_RCFLAG_LASTBLOCK
00100     MYSTORE(e, ttpad, 0);
00101     MYSTORE(e, timex, 0);
00102     res = ccn_ref_tagged_BLOB(CCN_DTAG_Timestamp, content_object,
00103                               pc->offset[CCN_PCO_B_Timestamp],
00104                               pc->offset[CCN_PCO_E_Timestamp],
00105                               &blob, &blob_size);
00106     if (res < 0 || blob_size > sizeof(e->timex))
00107         return(-1);
00108     memcpy(e->timex + sizeof(e->timex) - blob_size, blob, blob_size);
00109     // XXX - need to set accession time. Should we pass it in?
00110     MYSTORE64(e, cobid, cobid);
00111     res = ccn_ref_tagged_BLOB(CCN_DTAG_PublisherPublicKeyDigest, content_object,
00112                               pc->offset[CCN_PCO_B_PublisherPublicKeyDigest],
00113                               pc->offset[CCN_PCO_E_PublisherPublicKeyDigest],
00114                               &blob, &blob_size);
00115     if (res < 0 || blob_size != sizeof(e->ppkdg))
00116         return(-1);
00117     memcpy(e->ppkdg, blob, sizeof(e->ppkdg));
00118     /* Now actually do the insert */
00119     res = ccn_btree_insert_entry(node, ndx,
00120                                  flatname->buf, flatname->length,
00121                                  e, sizeof(*e));
00122     return(res);
00123 }
00124 
00125 /**
00126  * Test for a match between the ContentObject described by a btree 
00127  * index entry and an Interest, assuming that it is already known that
00128  * there is a prefix match.
00129  *
00130  * This does not need access to the actual ContentObject, since the index
00131  * entry contains everything that we know to know to do the match.
00132  *
00133  * @param node                  leaf node
00134  * @param ndx                   index of entry within leaf node
00135  * @param interest_msg          ccnb-encoded Interest
00136  * @param pi                    corresponding parsed interest
00137  * @param scratch               for scratch use
00138  *
00139  * @result 1 for match, 0 for no match, -1 for error.
00140  */
00141 int
00142 ccn_btree_match_interest(struct ccn_btree_node *node, int ndx,
00143                          const unsigned char *interest_msg,
00144                          const struct ccn_parsed_interest *pi,
00145                          struct ccn_charbuf *scratch)
00146 {
00147     const unsigned char *blob = NULL;
00148     const unsigned char *nextcomp = NULL;
00149     int i;
00150     int n;
00151     int ncomps;
00152     int pubidend;
00153     int pubidstart;
00154     int res;
00155     int rnc;
00156     size_t blob_size = 0;
00157     size_t nextcomp_size = 0;
00158     size_t size;
00159     struct ccn_btree_content_payload *e = NULL;
00160     unsigned char *flatname = NULL;
00161     
00162     e = ccn_btree_node_getentry(sizeof(*e), node, ndx);
00163     if (e == NULL || e->magic[0] != CCN_BT_CONTENT_MAGIC)
00164         return(-1);
00165     
00166     ncomps = MYFETCH(e, ncomp);
00167     if (ncomps < pi->prefix_comps + pi->min_suffix_comps)
00168         return(0);
00169     if (ncomps > pi->prefix_comps + pi->max_suffix_comps)
00170         return(0);
00171     /* Check that the publisher id matches */
00172     pubidstart = pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_PublisherID];
00173     pubidend = pi->offset[CCN_PI_E_PublisherID];
00174     if (pubidstart < pubidend) {
00175         blob_size = 0;
00176         ccn_ref_tagged_BLOB(CCN_DTAG_PublisherPublicKeyDigest,
00177                             interest_msg,
00178                             pubidstart, pubidend,
00179                             &blob, &blob_size);
00180         if (blob_size != sizeof(e->ppkdg))
00181             return(0);
00182         if (0 != memcmp(blob, e->ppkdg, blob_size))
00183             return(0);
00184     }
00185     /* Do Exclude processing if necessary */
00186     if (pi->offset[CCN_PI_E_Exclude] > pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_Exclude]) {
00187         res = ccn_btree_key_fetch(scratch, node, ndx);
00188         if (res < 0)
00189             return(-1);
00190         flatname = scratch->buf;
00191         size = scratch->length;
00192         nextcomp = NULL;
00193         nextcomp_size = 0;
00194         for (i = 0, n = 0; i < size; i += CCNFLATSKIP(rnc), n++) {
00195             rnc = ccn_flatname_next_comp(flatname + i, size - i);
00196             if (rnc <= 0)
00197                 return(-1);
00198             if (n == pi->prefix_comps) {
00199                 nextcomp = flatname + i + CCNFLATDELIMSZ(rnc);
00200                 nextcomp_size = CCNFLATDATASZ(rnc);
00201                 break;
00202             }
00203         }
00204         if (nextcomp == NULL)
00205             return(0);
00206         if (ccn_excluded(interest_msg + pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_Exclude],
00207                          (pi->offset[CCN_PI_E_Exclude] -
00208                           pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_Exclude]),
00209                          nextcomp,
00210                          nextcomp_size))
00211             return(0);
00212     }
00213     /*
00214      * At this point the prefix matches and exclude-by-next-component is done.
00215      */
00216     // test any other qualifiers here
00217     return(1);
00218 }
00219 
00220 /**
00221  *  Get cobid from btree entry.
00222  *
00223  * @returns the cobid field of the indexed entry of node, or 0 if error.
00224  */
00225 uint_least64_t
00226 ccn_btree_content_cobid(struct ccn_btree_node *node, int ndx)
00227 {
00228     struct ccn_btree_content_payload *e = NULL;
00229     uint_least64_t ans = 0;
00230     
00231     e = ccn_btree_node_getentry(sizeof(*e), node, ndx);
00232     if (e != NULL)
00233         ans = MYFETCH64(e, cobid);
00234     return(ans);
00235 }
00236 
00237 /**
00238  *  Set cobid in a btree entry.
00239  *
00240  * @returns 0 for success, -1 for failure
00241  */
00242 int
00243 ccn_btree_content_set_cobid(struct ccn_btree_node *node, int ndx,
00244                             uint_least64_t cobid)
00245 {
00246     struct ccn_btree_content_payload *e = NULL;
00247     ptrdiff_t dirty;
00248     
00249     e = ccn_btree_node_getentry(sizeof(*e), node, ndx);
00250     if (e == NULL)
00251         return(-1);
00252     MYSTORE64(e, cobid, cobid);
00253     dirty = (((unsigned char *)e) - node->buf->buf);
00254     if (dirty >= 0 && dirty < node->clean)
00255         node->clean = dirty;
00256     return(0);
00257 }
00258 
00259 /**
00260  *  Get ContentObject size from btree entry.
00261  *
00262  * @returns the cobsz field of the indexed entry of node, or -1 if error.
00263  */
00264 int
00265 ccn_btree_content_cobsz(struct ccn_btree_node *node, int ndx)
00266 {
00267     struct ccn_btree_content_payload *e = NULL;
00268     
00269     e = ccn_btree_node_getentry(sizeof(*e), node, ndx);
00270     if (e != NULL)
00271         return(MYFETCH(e, cobsz));
00272     return(-1);
00273 }
